Css Normal Problem

22 Jan 2014 - Mickey

1. DIV Centering

.father {
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.child {
    float: left;      /* 元素浮动方向     */
    display: inline;  /* 作为内联元素显示 */
}

2. Background Opacity

.back {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.6);
}
